headline: Citigroup Gets Approval to Sell Russia-Based Banking Unit
summary: C secures the Kremlin's approval to sell its Russia unit to Renaissance Capital, speeding its long-planned exit from the market.

headline: Can Goldman's Expansion in Private Equity Credit Drive Growth?
summary: GS ramps up private equity and credit with acquisitions, global expansion and boosted alternatives fundraising goals.

headline: Citigroup Bets Big on China Rebound as Global Capital Circles Back
summary: After years of retreat, Citi is doubling down on Chinese growth and cross-border flows--just as dealmaking flickers back to life.

headline: Citigroup: EPS Beat And RoTCE Progress, But Execution Risks Persist (Upgrade)
summary: Citigroup shows tangible book growth, better RoTCE, broad Q3 revenue gains, valuation changes and key execution risks. Find out why C stock is upgraded to hold.

headline: Capital One Debit-Card Users Aren’t All Happy After the Switch to Discover
summary: The bank is moving its debit cards over from the Mastercard network after completing its acquisition of Discover earlier this year.

raw.headline: Capital One Debit-Card Users Aren’t All Happy After the Switch to Discover

headline: Citi: M&A Pipeline in 2026 One of Richest Ever
summary: Vis Raghavan, Head of Banking and Executive Vice Chair at Citi, says dealmaking activity will be "absolutely hectic" next year. He speaks with Stephen Engle from the sidelines of the Citi China Conference in Shanghai.

headline: Citigroup: Turnaround Thesis Is As Strong As Ever
summary: Citigroup posts strong Q3 results with 9% revenue growth, improved profitability, and attractive valuation. Read an analysis of C stock here.
